headline: U.S. Oil Majors Slash Jobs Despite Trump’s Fossil Fuel Push
summary: Despite Trump’s support for fossil fuel expansion, U.S. oil majors are cutting thousands of jobs as low oil prices and megamerger costs squeeze profits.

raw.headline: U.S. Oil Majors Slash Jobs Despite Trump’s Fossil Fuel Push
raw.summary: Despite Trump’s support for fossil fuel expansion, U.S. oil majors are cutting thousands of jobs as low oil prices and megamerger costs squeeze profits.

headline: The Paradigm Shift No Investor Can Ignore
summary: The economy is experiencing a fundamental shift from the 2009-2021 era of low inflation and easy money to a more challenging environment. Read why inflation is shifting the narrative.

raw.headline: The Paradigm Shift No Investor Can Ignore
raw.summary: The economy is experiencing a fundamental shift from the 2009-2021 era of low inflation and easy money to a more challenging environment. Read why inflation is shifting the narrative.

headline: U.S. Oil Patch Sheds Jobs as Producers Face Weaker Prices
summary: Employment in the industry fell by 1.7% in August, per data from the Bureau of Labor Statistics
